content.title: Intro
content.content:
1960
Preceded by
1960
1961
Year
1962
Followed by
1962

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1961.

content.title: January
content.content:
4 - Actor Graham McTavish is born.
5 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 227.
5 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mme Ossendrijver.
24 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 228.

content.title: February
content.content:
12 - Joseph Pearce is born.
13 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 228a.
23 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 229.
28 - Mark Ferguson, who would play Gil-galad in The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, is born.

content.title: April
content.content:
10 - Actress Lorraine Ashbourne is born.
28 - Jamieson Price, who would voice Aragorn in The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring, is born.

content.title: May
content.content:
6 - Actor Wally Wingert is born.
9 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mr. Hart.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien spends a Sunday with a fan club at Queen's College in Cambridge (as the meeting happened mid-month, it was most probably on Sunday, the 14th of May).
17 - Singer Enya is born.
23 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Rayner Unwin.

content.title: June
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Jan Broberg.
8 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 230.

content.title: August
content.content: 21 - An interview with J.R.R. Tolkien ("Den besynnerlige professor Tolkien") is published in Swedish.

content.title: October
content.content:
4 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 231.
31 - Director Peter Jackson is born in Pukerua Bay, New Zealand.

content.title: November
content.content:
4 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 232.
13 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Paul Barnetson.
15 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 233.
15 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Jane Neave.
22 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 234.

content.title: December
content.content:
6 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 235.
29 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Miss Perry.
30 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 236.

? - J.R.R. Tolkien, nominated by C.S. Lewis, was rejected by the Nobel Prize jury.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Christopher Fettes.
? - Author Joseph Pearce is born.
Years
1958 1959 1960 1961 1962 1963 1964
